page.title: 20KILMERSDON LACK OF AMENITIES
page.content:
The area is fully supplied with water and electricity but not gas. As an alternative, calor gas can be used.
There is some mains drainage available in Kilmersdon village, but none in Charlton or Newbury and septic tanks are used there.
There are no street lights except in Kilmersdon village and the road leading to the school. Again Charlton and Newbury have none.
In l985 a geological survey for oil was carried out using a seismograph. The results are not known yet (December l985).
